name: Pokemon - Green Version (English)
description:
This is Pokemon Green Version in english!

This is not like the bootleg incorrectly translated pokemon green, this is the proper pokemon green in english!

I hope you enjoy!

NOTE:

I am NOT the original owner of this game, I have published this game on this site for public enjoyment and entertainment.

I give credits to: Nintendo, the Pokemon Company, Satoshi Tajiri, GameFreak, Creatures, Sketendo, etc.
